footer.tagline: Helping local businesses thrive on delivery platforms.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: We help independent businesses thrive in the delivery economy
storyParagraphs: Foodmoods was born from a simple observation: delivery platforms represent a tremendous opportunity for local businesses, but their daily management can be time-consuming and complex.

Founded in 2020 by Didier Gribeauval, Foodmoods aims to democratize access to these platforms. We believe that every grocery store, every neighborhood shop deserves to benefit from this digital revolution, without having to sacrifice their time or resources.
We have supported more than 500 businesses throughout France, allowing them to focus on what they do best: serving their customers and bringing their neighborhoods to life.

values.title: Our Mission
values.description: Enable all independent businesses to benefit from the delivery boom, without technical complexity or administrative burden.

values.title: Our Vision
values.description: Become the reference partner for local businesses in their digital transformation and growth on platforms.

values.title: Our Commitment
values.description: Offer quality, transparent and personalized service that generates concrete results for our partners.
